name: Avatar
description: Visual representation of a user or entity with image, initials, or icon fallback and optional status indicator

accessibility.screenReader: Announces as an image with role=img and aria-label describing the user (alt text, name, or 'Avatar'). Status indicator includes an accessible label when present.

recommendedUsage: Use in user profiles, comment sections, navigation headers, or anywhere user identity needs visual representation. Provide meaningful alt text or name for accessibility.
antiPatterns: Do not use decorative images without accessible labels. Avoid using for non-user content where an Icon component would be more appropriate.
